issue.title: [Rust] Shape and stride check in tensor
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9934](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9934). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When creating a tensor there is no check for the supplied shape and stride. There should be a check before creating the tensor object.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9934?focusedCommentId=17201385) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8129
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8129>
